#summary install JAP_LOCAL_NODE

=Install JAP_LOCAL_NODE=

==Pre-installation==
  * [INSTALL_NODE install NODE >= 0.8.0]

==Installation==
  * unzip JAP_LOCAL_NODE-X.X.X.zip
  * open JAP_LOCAL_NODE-X.X.X
  * [CONFIGURE_JAP configure JAP_LOCAL_NODE.json.js]
    * LOCAL_PROXY_SERVER.ADDRESS
    * LOCAL_PROXY_SERVER.PORT
    * REMOTE_PROXY_SERVERS[] (array of REMOTE_PROXY_SERVER)
    * REMOTE_PROXY_SERVER.TYPE (type of REMOTE_PROXY_SERVER, "HTTP" or "HTTPS")
    * REMOTE_PROXY_SERVER.ADDRESS
    * REMOTE_PROXY_SERVER.PORT (standard "HTTP" is port 80, "HTTPS" is port 443)
    * REMOTE_PROXY_SERVER.AUTHENTICATION.USERNAME
    * REMOTE_PROXY_SERVER.AUTHENTICATION.PASSWORD
    * REMOTE_PROXY_SERVER.CERTIFICATE.AUTHENTICATION.FILE (CA.pem of REMOTE_PROXY_SERVER if type of REMOTE_PROXY_SERVER is "HTTPS")
    * PROXY_SERVER.ADDRESS
    * PROXY_SERVER.PORT
    * PROXY_SERVER.AUTHENTICATION.USERNAME
    * PROXY_SERVER.AUTHENTICATION.PASSWORD
  * execute JAP_LOCAL_NODE.bat
  * open
    * FIREFOX
      * click TOOLS, OPTIONS
      * click ADVANCED, NETWORK, SETTINGS
      * check MANUAL PROXY CONFIGURATION
      * in SOCKS write 127.0.0.1 and LOCAL_PROXY_SERVER.PORT
      * check SOCKS v5
      * click OK
      * click OK
    * INTERNET EXPLORER
      * click TOOLS, INTERNET OPTIONS
      * click CONNECTIONS, LAN SETTINGS
      * uncheck AUTOMATICALLY DETECT PROXY SETTINGS
      * uncheck USE A PROXY AUTOMATIC CONFIGURATION SCRIPT
      * check USE A PROXY SERVER FOR YOUR LAN (THESE SETTINGS WILL NOT APPLY TO DAIL-UP OR VPN CONNECTIONS)
      * click ADVANCED
      * in SOCKS write 127.0.0.1 and LOCAL_PROXY_SERVER.PORT
      * click OK
      * click OK
      * click OK
